msContents.summary: A multitext manuscript containing theBṛhadāraṇyaka Upaniṣad, in the Kāṇva recension (adhyāya 1-8), and the Bṛhadāraṇyaka-Upaniṣad-Bhāṣya of Ānandatīrtha (adhyāya 1-8).

msItem.title: Bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣad
msItem.incipit:
uṣā vā aśvasya medhyasya śiraḥ sūryaś cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇo vyāttam agnir vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsara ātmāśvasya medhyasya dyauḥ pṛṣṭham aṃtarikṣam udaraṃ pṛthivī pājasyaṃ diśaḥ spārśve avāntara
diśaḥ parśava ṛtavo ṃgāni māsāś cārdhamāsāś ca parvāṇy ahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇy asthīni nabho māṃsāni |
msItem.explicit:
turaḥ
kāvaṣeyaḥ | prajāpateḥ prajāpatir braṃmhaṇaḥ braṃmha svayaṃbhu braṃmhaṇe namaḥ ||—||
msItem.finalRubric:
iti aṣṭamabrāṃmhaṇaḥ ||—|| iti śrīmadbṛhadāraṃṇyakopaniṣadi aṣṭamodhyāyaḥ ||—|| iti
bṛhadāraṃṇyakopaniṣat samāptā || śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇam astu || oṃ śāṃtiś śāṃtiś śāṃtiḥ || hari oṃ || asmadgūrvaṃtargatabhāratīramaṇamukhyaprāṇāṃtargata śrīrāmavedavyāsaḥ priyatāṃ ||—|| śrī
msItem.colophon:
varṣe duṃdubhisaṃjñite ca surabhau kāle ṛtau mādhave śuklamāsi ca pakṣake ca jalabhe saumye caturthī dine | tuṣṭyai mādhavamadhvayoś ca bṛhadāraṃṇyābhidhā sādaraṃ raṃmyā copaniṣaveṃbalikhitā śrī
śrīnivāsena hi || harapurṇaṃ likhitaṃ veṃkaṃṇācāryaputreṇa śrīnivāsena || śrī vedavyāso jayatu ||

msItem.title: Bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣadbhāṣyaṃ
msItem.author: Ānandatīrtha
msItem.incipit:
prāṇāder īśitāraṃ paramasukhanidhiṃ sarvadoṣavyapetaṃ sarvāṃtasthaṃ supūrṇaṃ prakṛti patimajaṃ sarvabāhyaṃ sunityam | sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktiṃ su
ramunim anujādyais sadā sevyamānaṃ viṣṇuṃ vande sadāhaṃ sakalajagadanādyaṃtam ānaṃdādaṃ taṃ ||
msItem.explicit: oṃ pūrṇāgaṇyaguṇodāradhamne nityāya vedhase | amandānandasāṃdrāya preyase viṣṇave namaḥ ||—||
msItem.finalRubric:
iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite śrī
madbṛhadāraṃṇyakabhāṣye aṣṭamo dhyāyaḥ ||—|| ❈ ||—|| śrīhaligirivāsāya namaḥ || hayavadanāya namaḥ ||
msItem.colophon:
duṃdubhyākhye vatsare tu grīṣme jyeṣṭhe sitetare | pakṣe ca paṃcamīyya
sre ravivāre sraviṣṭabhe veṃkaṃṇṇācāryaputreṇa srīnivāsena sādaraṃ | bṛhadāraṃṇyopaniṣadbhāṣyaṃ ca likhitaṃ varaṃ ||—|| śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī

extent.measure: 134 numbered folios, 3 guard folios at the end of the bundle

origin.origDate: The colophon of the Bṛhadāraṇyaka Upaṇiṣad should correspond to the 14th of April 1802, the one of the Bhāṣya to the 20th of June 1802.
